content.description: A scientist investigated the radiation sensitivity of different mammals to <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>-rays to determine the <math alttext="L D 5 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>L</mi><mi>D</mi><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> within 30 days. Results from the study are included below.
content.question: Resistance of different mammals to <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>-rays. Mammal Species <math alttext="L D 5 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>L</mi><mi>D</mi><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> Dose Guinea pig <math alttext="200 through 400" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>400</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Dog <math alttext="325" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>325</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Goat <math alttext="350" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>350</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Hamster <math alttext="700" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>700</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Rabbit <math alttext="800" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Based on the <math alttext="L D 5 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>L</mi><mi>D</mi><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> data in the table, which of the following equations should be used to calculate how many times greater the resistance of a rabbit to <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-rays is than that of a dog?

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Determine an approach or method aligned with the problem to be solved.
